name: FAIRY TAIL: Fierce Fight
description:
3D ARPG×Magic×Guilds! Experience the story and grow your guild!
The strongest team is assembled! Get ready to embark on a fantastic magical adventure with your guildmates! The brand-new official 3D action mobile game, "FAIRY TAIL: Fierce Fight" is officially launched!
Experience the most authentic and vivid magical world with the intense and passionate anime storyline. Engage in battles with nearly 40 wizards in highly detailed 3D environments. Build your ultimate team by utilizing diverse wizard types and unique counter relationships. In the 3D free battle system that seamlessly combines strategy and action, confront the Underworld King Mard Geer, outsmart the Oracion Seis, and challenge the Tower of Heaven. Explore various enjoyable gameplay contents to sharpen your combat skills!



***Relive the Classic Storyline***
Officially authorized by Kodansha and based on the popular TV anime "FAIRY TAIL", the action mobile game "FAIRY TAIL: Fierce Fight" faithfully recreates anime scenes and revisits classic chapters like the Battle of Tartaros. Join forces with guildmates to combat formidable enemies such as the Eisenwald, Oracion Seis, and the Underworld King Mard Geer. Rediscover the profound bonds among Fairy Tail members, grow in battle, and reignite your passion for adventure.

***Immerse in 3D Intense Battles***
Witness dazzling magical animations and experience intense 3D action to faithfully portray each wizard's unique magic. The unique shield-breaking mechanism challenges your understanding of magical combat. Utilize the counter relationships between wizards, pay attention to strategic positioning and dodging, and seize the perfect timing to seamlessly chain skills, all contributing to creating a completely new combat experience.

***Build the Ultimate Team***
The true essence of the ultimate team lies in fearlessness when fighting alongside genuine companions. Original voice actors such as Kakihara Tetsuya, Hirano Aya, Ohara Sayaka, and Nakamura Yuichi lend their voices to recreate classic battles from the anime, immersing you in every intense fight!

***Embark on a Thrilling Adventure***
In addition to the main quests, the game offers various content, including the Arena, the Palace of Perdition, Pandemonium, and Oracion Seis. Compete with other wizards in PvP battles, advance through higher levels in the Narakumiya Challenge, and confront bosses in the Pandemonium and Oracion Seis Challenge. Collect ample resources for wizard development, ensuring a rich and colorful journey of wizardry.
